attributes.action: Make All buses accessible to wheelchair users
attributes.additional_details: As a wheelchair user and a regular user of public transport in Southampton the inaccessibility buses is preventing me from working. The Government is intent on encouraging disabled people back to to work but, how can I get to my place of work without accessible transport?  I feel strongly that the government should do more to encourage bus operators to prioritise the needs of disabled customers and also other groups of society who would benefit from improved access.
